title: Centennial should be an SDK - not a mere converter
body: It should be possible to create Visual Studio Centennial Project in WinForms, WPF, Win32, MFC, etc, which should also allow mixing of UWP Code (Like XAML UI) with full interop between native and UWP Platform. This should be the standard way to create and distribute powerful applications that are not restricted by the sandbox like universal apps.

comments.body: For me also mixed UI is important. We can't move our entire UI in one go, that is a too big upfront investment.
I voted for this since I nearly created an issue titled "Please support mixed WPF Xaml and UWP Xaml UI for Project Centennial"
